> <OLD>
>
> Hidras hissed and replied "We must be ready for everything and act in
> consecuence"

The ship bucked once and then again as it pulled away from the large
glowing sphere and hovertanks and began to move swiftly through the
atmosphere.

"So now what?" JHIAXUS said as he brought the ship back under control.

SCOROPNOK pressed a few keys and brought up a few starcharts, "I can
tell you this much, we are not on Earth anymore." He said curiously.
He pressed a few more keys on his console, "And we are no longer in
the past. We are back in the presnt."

Then the warning siren went off, there were four individuals
approaching, all of them having Predacon signatures. The computer
immediately recognized them: The COMBATRONS: HELLSCREAM, MAX-B,
DIRGEGUN, and THRUSTOR, they were all units who belonged to MEGASTORM!

All of them were in jet mode and approaching fast!

"Drop shields and shut down your engines and weapons." HELLSCREAM
transmitted, "Prepare to be boarded."
